text: [Ja'quʙ] Guft: «Hargiz ūro ʙo şumo naxoham firistod, to ʙo man ʙa nomi Alloh taolo pajmoni ustuvore ʙiʙanded, ki hatman ūro nazdi man ʙozmeovared, magar on ki giriftor şaved [va heç jak naçot najoʙed]. Pas, cun [ahdu] pajmoni ustuvori xeş ʙa ū dodand, [Ja'quʙ] guft: «Alloh taolo ʙar on ci megūem, [guvohu] nigahʙon ast»
